game.name: Crevice Animal
game.description:
Being an animal that wants to live a life in an underground environment can be very challenging. However, this challenge can be turned into a great fun when you try your hands in this brand new adventure game. In Crevice Animal, you are playing the role of a small cat that is going to lose his favorite underground dwelling. Now you want a place to live in the save areas of cave before your presently place is destroyed. 

Your objective in this free online platform game is to find a safe place for the cat to live before rocks falling upon it. Try to be very fast and help this cute and lovely animal dodge all the obstacles! Make sure to guide it towards a crevice to ensure its safely. Be alert all the time when you are in the underground area and traverse these traps properly! Push your cat forward to run and grab as much mushrooms as possible!

You can enjoy playing with other cool animals including elephant, bear, fox and more. Other different animals would also need your help to escape safely from that place. Guide them towards a safe place by running and jumping timely! The collection of enough mushrooms will help you to unlock and rescue other lovely animals. Learn today how far your cat and other animals can do before the cave crushes them! Have the best fun without download games!!
